src_text: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

hyp_text: Nnipa a wɔn nyimpa a na Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, a ɔhemmaa a wɔn ahemmaa a Argentina, wɔyɛe sɛ ɛnhyɛ wɔn presidential bidziɛn yɛn yɛn nyinaa La Plata, a ɔhemmaa 50 kilomita (31 mɔl) a wɔn nyinaa Buenos Aires a.

src_text: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.
